item.title: About
item.description: About I’m a software engineer in Chicago, IL. I’m currently the VP of Engineering at Neighborhoods.com. I really like solving hard problems around high availability systems, distributed systems, scaling, and performance. Technical Skills Languages: PHP, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Swift, BASH, C/C++ Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MSSQL, DynamoDB, MongoDB DevOps Tools: Amazon Web Services, Docker, Terraform, Ansible, Packer, Jenkins CI Concepts: Application Architecture, Immutable Infrastructure, High Availability, Distributed Systems, Infrastructure Architecture, Cloud Computing
